Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
BodyScript
HeaderContents
HeaderContents
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT [UserId] FROM [Utilisateur] WHERE @mail = [Email] AND dbo.SF_GeneratePWD([Salt]+@pwd) = [Password] RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT cl.ClientId, co.Prenom, co.Nom, co.Surnom, co.Tel, co.Email, co.Rue, co.Num, co.CodePostal, co.Ville, co.Pays, cl.NomSociete, cl.NumTVA FROM Client cl, Contact co WHERE co.ContactId=cl.ContactId RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE Client SET NomSociete=@NomSociete, NumTVA=@NumTVA, ContactId=@ContactId WHERE ClientId=@ClientId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE Contact SET Prenom=@Prenom, Nom=@Nom, Surnom=@Surnom, Tel=@Tel, Email=@Email, Rue=@Rue, Num=@Num, CodePostal=@CodePostal, Ville=@Ville, Pays=@Pays WHERE ContactId=@ContactId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value:
SELECT cl.NomSociete,cl.NumTVA, co.Prenom, co.Nom, co.Surnom, co.Email, co.Tel, co.Rue, co.Num, co.CodePostal, co.Ville, co.Pays FROM Contact co, Client cl WHERE co.ContactId=cl.ContactId
--CREATE VIEW [dbo].[V_Users] --AS SELECT [UserId], [Prenom], [Nom], [Email], [Role] --FROM [Utilisateur]
